sqlMap.select: select MSG_LOG_ID, CREDITAPLLICATION_ID, OPERATE_DATE, OPERATOR_ID, OPERATOR_NAME, MAXLOANLIMIT_ERROR, MAXLOANLIMIT_RIGHT, DEVIATION_RATE from RL_MSG_LOG where MSG_LOG_ID = #msgLogId:DECIMAL#

select MSG_LOG_ID as msgLogId, CREDITAPLLICATION_ID as creditapllicationId, OPERATE_DATE as operateDate, OPERATOR_ID as operatorId, OPERATOR_NAME as operatorName, MAXLOANLIMIT_ERROR as maxloanlimitError, MAXLOANLIMIT_RIGHT maxloanlimitRight, DEVIATION_RATE as deviationRate from RL_MSG_LOG where CREDITAPLLICATION_ID = #creditapllicationId:DECIMAL#
sqlMap.insert:
select seq_basic_info.nextval as value from dual
insert into RL_MSG_LOG (MSG_LOG_ID, CREDITAPLLICATION_ID, OPERATE_DATE, OPERATOR_ID, OPERATOR_NAME, MAXLOANLIMIT_ERROR, MAXLOANLIMIT_RIGHT, DEVIATION_RATE) values (#msgLogId:DECIMAL#, #creditapllicationId:DECIMAL#, #operateDate:TIMESTAMP#, #operatorId:DECIMAL#, #operatorName:VARCHAR#, #maxloanlimitError:DECIMAL#, #maxloanlimitRight:DECIMAL#, #deviationRate:DECIMAL#)
sqlMap.update: update RL_MSG_LOG set CREDITAPLLICATION_ID = #creditapllicationId:DECIMAL#, OPERATE_DATE = #operateDate:TIMESTAMP#, OPERATOR_ID = #operatorId:DECIMAL#, OPERATOR_NAME = #operatorName:VARCHAR#, MAXLOANLIMIT_ERROR = #maxloanlimitError:DECIMAL#, MAXLOANLIMIT_RIGHT = #maxloanlimitRight:DECIMAL#, DEVIATION_RATE = #deviationRate:DECIMAL# where MSG_LOG_ID = #msgLogId:DECIMAL#

update RL_MSG_LOG
CREDITAPLLICATION_ID = #creditapllicationId:DECIMAL#
OPERATE_DATE = #operateDate:TIMESTAMP#
OPERATOR_ID = #operatorId:DECIMAL#
OPERATOR_NAME = #operatorName:VARCHAR#
MAXLOANLIMIT_ERROR = #maxloanlimitError:DECIMAL#
MAXLOANLIMIT_RIGHT = #maxloanlimitRight:DECIMAL#
DEVIATION_RATE = #deviationRate:DECIMAL#
where MSG_LOG_ID = #msgLogId:DECIMAL#
